hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #1# major item.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Near Scarecrow Chest

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Shadow Temple#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #cow behind webs# in a grotto gifts #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Broken Sword# can be found in #the Market#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: Did you know that Blue Fire destroys mud walls and detonates Bomb Flowers?

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Switch Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found at #Zora's River#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #3# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: Open your eyes.^Open your eyes.^Wake up, @.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #Epona's Song#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path of #time#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Green Rupee# and #the Sun's Song#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #2# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Big Lava Room Lower Open Door Chest

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Ice Cavern#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Temple of Time# chimes with the music of #the Song of Storms#.

ToT (Left).text: I'm a helpful hint Gossip Stone!^See, I'm helping.

hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Early Silver Rupee Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.
